mapper.select: SELECT lc.id as id, lc.name as name, li.id as linkId, li.name as linkName, li.url, li.user_link_category_id as userLinkCategoryId, li.status as linkStatus, li.sort_no as linkSortNo FROM user_link_category ulc LEFT JOIN link_category lc ON ulc.link_category_id = lc.id LEFT JOIN link_info li ON ulc.id = li.user_link_category_id and li.status = 1 WHERE ulc.user_id = #{userId} and lc.status = 1
